name: What is Love
description:
This is our mash-up of a Brawler/Dating Sim.  It didn't quite turn out how we expected and we ended up creating a brawler which leads into a dating sim, but there's a few lessons to be learned there.

When rating, please note that the main backing music for most of the game was not created by us and should not be considered when rating for audio.

Controls
Movement - Arrow keys, WASD, Left Analogue Stick
Attack - Left Ctrl, Left mouse click, A button

Credits
Contestants
Been - Development and Design
Mandaaar - Graphics, Design, and Audio
Raging Whisky - Writing, Title and Ending music

Other credits
Level music - "No Control" by Jahzzar, From the Free Music Archive - CC BY SA
- http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Jahzzar/Super_1222/03_No_Control
